item.title: 一个顾问小组表示，英格兰教会应设立一个10亿英镑（约合12.7亿美元）的基金，以解决其与奴隶制的历史渊源问题。
item.description:
The Church of England should create a fund of 1 billion pounds ($1.27 billion) to address its historic links to slavery, an advisory panel said. https://t.co/W0KxCt3KWq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的律师再次要求推迟对让-卡罗尔（E. Jean Carroll）起诉前总统的诽谤案作出 8,300 万美元的判决。
item.description:
Attorneys for Donald Trump have repeated their request for a delay of the $83 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll's defamation case against the former president. https://t.co/zZBcNS09ux

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 俄亥俄州准备开始向社区和政府组织发放数百万美元的阿片类药物和解金，这是自 2021 年获得第一笔款项以来人们热切期盼的资金流入。
item.description:
Ohio is ready to begin doling out millions of dollars in opioid settlement money to community and government organizations, an influx eagerly anticipated since the first sums were secured in 2021. https://t.co/CjL81LCFMv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: "我宣布，在为费城老鹰队效力 13 个赛季之后，我将从 NFL 退役。"在一次情绪激动的新闻发布会上，费城老鹰队中锋杰森-凯尔斯宣布从 NFL 退役。
item.description:
"I announce I am retiring from the NFL after 13 seasons with the Philadelphia Eagles."

In an emotional press conference, Philadelphia Eagles center Jason Kelce announced his retirement from the NFL. https://t.co/W8An8TwDs8 pic.twitter.com/a6ymqP1Iij

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：费城老鹰队中锋杰森-凯尔斯（Jason Kelce）在美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）效力 13 个赛季后宣布退役。
item.description:
BREAKING: Philadelphia Eagles center Jason Kelce has announced his retirement after 13 seasons in the NFL. https://t.co/zxgyyDE9vr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：杰森-凯尔斯（Jason Kelce）在宣布离开美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）时情绪激动，频频停顿，他讲述了自己的橄榄球生活史：
item.description:
BREAKING: An emotional Jason Kelce, who paused frequently as he struggled to make the announcement that he's leaving the NFL, recounted the history of his football life.

Watch his press conference: https://t.co/Uskimo8Zqw pic.twitter.com/Qan2wCxtOJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国航空公司周一宣布订购大量新飞机，在空中客车公司、波音公司和巴西航空工业公司之间分购 260 架新飞机，此举旨在满足日益增长的旅行需求，并增加该航空公司的高端座位供应。
item.description:
American Airlines announced a massive order for new planes on Monday, splitting 260 new aircraft between Airbus, Boeing and Embraer in a move designed to meet growing travel demand and increase the airline's supply of premium seats. https://t.co/PxzLxa2E2A

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在凡尔赛宫举行的历史性议会联席会议上，法国立法者通过了一项法案，将妇女堕胎的权利写入国家宪法。
item.description:
BREAKING: French lawmakers have approved a bill that will enshrine a woman’s right to an abortion in the nation's constitution during a historic joint session of parliament at the Palace of Versailles. https://t.co/c8HPKOHpaV pic.twitter.com/CcY35CUtLr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：在凡尔赛宫举行的历史性议会联席会议上，法国立法者通过了一项法案，将妇女堕胎的权利写入国家宪法。
item.description:
JUST IN: French lawmakers have approved a bill that will enshrine a woman’s right to an abortion in the nation's constitution during a historic joint session of parliament at the Palace of Versailles. https://t.co/gH8lavS1EG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普就最高法院对第 14 修正案的历史性裁决发表讲话，该裁决使他重新获得了科罗拉多州的选票："我非常尊重最高法院......他们不会对我提起那样的诉讼，让领先的人退出竞选"。
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump addresses the historic SCOTUS ruling on the 14th Amendment, reinstating him on the Colorado ballot:

"I have great respect for the Supreme Court ... they're not going to go after me with that kind of lawsuit that takes somebody out of a race who is leading." pic.twitter.com/9cRAqqpfRu

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最高法院对前总统特朗普的第 14 修正案案件的判决是一致通过的，但这并不意味着没有争议。
item.description:
The Supreme Court's decision on former Pres. Trump's 14th Amendment case was unanimous — but that doesn't mean there weren't disputes. https://t.co/ZnyiayfukE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周六，警方在佐治亚州六旗游乐园附近与多达 600 人的 "不守规矩人群 "交火，一名 15 岁的少年中枪身亡，当局称正在追捕多名嫌疑人。
item.description:
Multiple suspects are being sought after a 15-year-old teenager was shot Saturday when police exchanged gunfire with what they described as an "unruly crowd" of up to 600 people near the Six Flags Over Georgia amusement park, authorities said. https://t.co/Uq58lVbqFe pic.twitter.com/7wdoMRtKsx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 纪念：30 年前的今天，演员兼喜剧演员约翰-坎迪（John Candy）去世，享年 43 岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: Thirty years ago today, actor and comedian John Candy died at 43. https://t.co/aam4wk8zCA pic.twitter.com/U8NUR5RTb0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 据俄亥俄州警方称，周六，一名邮政工作人员在他的邮车上遭到 "有针对性的袭击"，不幸中弹身亡。
item.description:
A postal worker was in his mail van when he was fatally shot in a "targeted attack" on Saturday, according to Ohio police. https://t.co/wGy56ihUDY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: Opill 的母公司周一表示，首款无需处方即可购买的非处方避孕药 Opill 将于本月晚些时候在网上和药店发售。
item.description:
Opill, the first over-the-counter birth control pill that can be purchased without a prescription, will be available later this month online and in pharmacies, its parent company said Monday. https://t.co/VR7Gl1ES7x pic.twitter.com/G0DwBznbbz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：前总统特朗普家族房地产公司的前首席财务官艾伦-韦塞尔伯格（Allen Weisselberg）已承认因在特朗普民事欺诈案审判中作证而被控作伪证。
item.description:
BREAKING: Allen Weisselberg, the ex-chief financial officer of former Pres. Trump's family real estate company, has pleaded guilty to perjury charges resulting from his testimony during Trump's civil fraud trial. https://t.co/tBm5lr8Ne6 pic.twitter.com/czVbG8ywkS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 当局称，在周一早些时候发生的枪战中，四名北加州治安官受伤，其中一人伤势严重。
item.description:
Four Northern California sheriff's deputies were injured — one critically — during a gunfight early Monday, authorities said. https://t.co/2faRYCG0a1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周一，欧盟对苹果公司进行了首次反垄断处罚，对这家美国科技巨头处以近 20 亿美元的罚款，原因是苹果不公平地偏袒自己的音乐流媒体服务，从而违反了欧盟的竞争法：
item.description:
The European Union leveled its first antitrust penalty against Apple on Monday, fining the U.S. tech giant nearly $2 billion for breaking the bloc's competition laws by unfairly favoring its own music streaming service over rivals.

Read more: https://t.co/wJkXmHTYK8 pic.twitter.com/crx5KS6WlJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 根据法庭文件，在宾夕法尼亚州农村家中被杀害的阿米什孕妇被发现躺在血泊中，喉咙被割断。
item.description:
The pregnant Amish woman who was killed in her rural Pennsylvania home was found lying in a pool of blood with her throat cut, according to court documents. https://t.co/p8YyZzJ5vH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：前空军国民警卫队队员杰克-特谢拉（Jack Teixeira）被控泄露大量机密军事文件并将其发布到网上，他已接受 16 年监禁的判决。
item.description:

item.title: 一名半挂卡车司机在俄亥俄河高空经历了 40 分钟的惊心动魄的营救，多亏一名消防员成功地将这名妇女从驾驶室拉到安全地带。
item.description:
A semitruck driver survived a harrowing 40 minute rescue high above the Ohio River thanks to a firefighter who successfully pulled the woman from the cab to safety. https://t.co/k7kJzpjwci pic.twitter.com/lxhtCknhZD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚政府官员周日表示，在一家私营公司就指向波音777客机位置的潜在新证据与他们接触后，他们对恢复搜索马来西亚航空公司MH370持开放态度：
item.description:
Government officials in Malaysia said on Sunday they'd be open to resuming the search for Malaysian Airlines MH370 after a private company approached them about potential new evidence pointing to the location of the Boeing 777.

Read more: https://t.co/3StGp0SiEb pic.twitter.com/k8gAkrLWMo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 周一，立法者将在凡尔赛宫举行议会联席会议，对一项将妇女堕胎权写入法国宪法的法案进行历史性的表决。
item.description:
A bill to enshrine a woman's right to an abortion in the French constitution goes to a historic vote on Monday, as lawmakers gather for a joint session of parliament at the Palace of Versailles. https://t.co/EyPr8ItCbM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024
